content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for your interest in the apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. Could you please provide me with a proposal for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate the rental price. I would like to pay the lowest price possible. Could you please provide me with a starting price?

Also, I am very dependable and responsible, so I would like to make sure that I am on good terms with the landlord.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Of course, I understand. As the landlord, I would like to maximize my gains, so I would like to propose a starting price of €500 per month. However, I am open to negotiating and would like to hear your proposal. In terms of our relationship, I would like to make sure that we have a clear and mutually beneficial understanding of the terms of our agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €450 per month.

I am very responsible and dependable, and I would like to make sure that I am on good terms with you as my landlord. I will pay rent on time and keep the apartment clean and in good condition. I will also inform you of any maintenance issues or repairs that need to be made.

I would like to move in as soon as possible. Do you have any availability for me to move in?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your prompt response and for agreeing to the rental price of €450 per month. As your landlord, I appreciate your commitment to paying rent on time and taking care of the apartment.

Regarding your move-in date, I have some availability in two weeks. Would that work for you? If not, please let me know what dates would work for you and we can try to arrange something accordingly.
name: Heinrich Heine
